item.description:
Amazing Cards Game With Alphabet for adult and kids. Easy to play at home and study new words for kids.


 This game is fun for kids and adults.



 Very suitable to play together in the family when going camping, party...



 Good for thinking and teaching kids new words.



 Help children practice memory and creativity


In Universe Of Words have:


 Number of regular cards: 26x2 = 52 cards
 Double card: On the card contains pairs of letters such as: tr, cr, br, wr, ch, ou, ng, th, qu. Number of 18 cards
 Skip card: Number of 5 cards
 Skipx2 card: Number of cards 5
 Draw card: Number of 10 cards (5 +1 cards, 5 +2 cards)


First, deal each player ten cards and put two cards on two star cells on the table The remaining cards should be placed face-down, to form the "draw" pile. The first person has to match one of his/her cards with placed cards on table in order to make a meaningful word. If the player doesn't have anything to match, he/she must pick a card from the draw pile. If he can play what is drawn, great. Otherwise play moves to the next person. You do not have to continue picking up until you come across a card you can match it with placed cards on the table. When you have one card left, you must yell " SOS " (meaning one). If you don't call " SOS" and you get cought by another player, you must pick up two cards from the draw pile. Once a player has no cards left, she/he is the winner. 
“ H” & “ F” card: Except for those who beat this card, the one who slaps his/her hand on the table the slowest must draw 2 cards from the draw pile.
The skip card: this card will skip the person next to you, and let the following player have her turn right away.
The skip cardx2: his card will skip the two people next to you, and let the following player have her/his turn right away.
The draw +1/+2 card: The player next to you will have to pick up one card/ two cards if you play one of these.
The wild card: This type of card lets you change the letter on your card. For example, if you don't have anything to match, you can throw drown the wild card and announce the letter you want to change.
The reverse card: If you play that card, then the order of play is reversed. Instead of the player on your left playing after you, it will pass to the one on your right. In other words, if play is proceeding clockwise, this card will change it to counter-clockwise.

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
